operator.label: Contains
operator.description: Selects any feature in the target layer that is contained within or shares a boundary with the provided shape.

operator.label: Envelope Intersect
operator.description: Selects any feature in the target layer where the bounding rectangle of that feature intersects with the bounding rectangle of the provided shape.

operator.label: Intersects
operator.description: Selects any feature in the target layer where any part of that feature touches or overlaps the provided shape.

operator.label: Overlaps
operator.description: Selects any feature in the target layer which overlaps the provided shape.

operator.label: Touches
operator.description: Selects any feature in the target layer which touches the boundary of the provided shape.

operator.label: Within
operator.description: Selects any feature in the target layer that completely encloses the provided shape and does not touch its boundary.
